canMoveThere(Square[][], int, int) - Method in class Piece

checkForCheck(int[][], int, int) - Method in class Board
function called within click() and checkGameEnd which removes any spaces that a piece could move to that would result in it being check
checkForPromotion() - Method in class Board
checks if any pawns have reached the end of the board by checking their endY
checkGameEnd(boolean) - Method in class Board
checks if the game is either stalemate or checkmate if the current player has no moves: if it is check, they lost by checkmate if it isn't, they have drawn by stalemate otherwise, just quickly check if there are only kings, in which case, stalemate
clearGameArena() - Method in class GameArena
Removes every object that has ever been added to the GameArena.
click() - Method in class Square
when the square is clicked, change the value of selected to !selected and update the visuals
click(double, double) - Method in class GameManager
click, called originally by gamearena, passed to inputmanager and then to gamemanager if within bounds of the board, identify what square has been clicked on?
click(double, double) - Method in class InputManager
originally identified by gamearena, calls click on the gamemanager for that to identify what to do
click(int, int) - Method in class Board
originally identified by the gamearena, passed to the input manager, passed to the gamemanager which identifies what square has been clicked now passed to the board with parameters identifying which square exactly was clicked, so it can identify what to do next clicking already selected square deselects it clicking a square with nothing on it does nothing clicking a square with a piece when it is its turn selects the square (if not already selected) clicking a square that is movable moves the piece selected there

N

noMoves(int) - Method in class Board
takes a tema colour and identifies if that team has any available moves scans all pieces on that team, then scans all their moves until finding one that is greater than 0, which means it can move

Piece - Class in Unnamed Package
A single piece, with multiple children that inherit from it and behave different
Piece(String, int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class Piece
Constructor
Piece.Bishop - Class in Unnamed Package
can move diagnoally in all directions up until there is another piece in the way if the piece is on the other team, it will take that piece
Piece.King - Class in Unnamed Package
can move in all directions but only one square
Piece.Knight - Class in Unnamed Package
knight: can move in 'L' shapes and can jump over pieces
Piece.Pawn - Class in Unnamed Package
can only move forward once at a time, but cannot take pieces directly ahead of it can only take pieces DIAGONALLY, but can only move diagonally when there is a piece there can move forward twice on its first turn
Piece.Queen - Class in Unnamed Package
can move diagonally and horizontally across the whole board, until there's a piece in the way
Piece.Rook - Class in Unnamed Package
can move up, down, left, right as many times as possible, up until there is another piece in the way if the piece is on the other team, it will take that piece
pieceName - Variable in class Piece
 
pieceNum - Variable in class Piece
